title: The Tories' First 11
itunes:title: The Tories' First 11
description:
11 candidates are in the race to be Conservative party leader, so far. Bloomberg's key reporters join us to discuss what we know about the candidates' policies and chances. On the show, UK Political Editor Kitty Donaldson, Senior Economics Reporter Philip Aldrick and Economics and Government Correspondent Lizzy Burden, join hosts Caroline Hepker and Yuan Potts. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
